name: Kero Kero Panic! (ケロケロパニック)
name_original: Kero Kero Panic! (ケロケロパニック)
description:
Strangest.io & Fakemoney.loan are independent development collectives creating multiplatform experimental interactions across the globe ❤. 

  Any support you can provide would be greatly appreciated. If you love something set it free. If it comes back it’s yours. If not, it was never meant to be.

Submit feedback for Strangest.io games here.
